EmailTemplate.subject: Connecting on your Five Star program questions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Congratulations on your selection as one of the 2013 Five Star Wealth Managers who will be included in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
I want to answer any questions you have about how you were chosen for the award, and how the winners will be announced in the magazine.
If you have a few minutes to talk, please send me an email with a time that works best for you, or call me at your convenience.
I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.Name} Account Manager
Five Star Professional 2117 Cliff Drive Eagan, MN 55122 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
Award candidates and award winners: Please tell us about your experience with Five Star Professional. http://fivestar.98d1e644fe2e.sgizmo.com/s3/
